Name: zho-anonymousgroupo-lad
Author: Anonymous Group Of Translators
Source: Goodword Books , http://www.goodwordbooks.com/ , Center for Peace and Spirituality , https://www.cpsglobal.org/

Translations.Text: Shāng zāi! Měi gè fěibàng zhě, dǐhuǐ zhě
tā jùjī cáichǎn, ér dàng zuò wǔqì
tā yǐwéi tā de cáichǎn, néng shǐ tā bù miè
Jué bùrán, tā bì 457 dìng yào bèi tóu zài huǐmiè kēng zhōng
Nǐ zěn néng zhīdào huǐmiè kēng shì shénme
Shì zhēnzhǔ de ránzhe de lièhuǒ
Néng shēng dào rén de xīn shàng
Tāmen bìdìng yào bèi guān zài lièhuǒ zhōng
diào zài xǔduō hěn gāo de zhùzi shàng
